name: Mickey the lobster & Bingo
description:
Looks like this time Mickey's affairs  have not goneunnoticed. Luciano's people figured everything out, and now it's time to run away and go to ground, where lobster should be. It sounds like Mickey needs to play smart to get away with it. Let's see if he'd manage...

Controls: Mouse click to use your claw.

 

Bezalel Academy of Arts & Designs
Art & Interaction course, guided by Dani Bacon and Rutu Modan
